Haverhill.WHAV: WHAV was an AM radio broadcasting station at 1490 kHz from 1947 to 2002. Today, the call letters are associated with 97.9 WHAV-LP, transmitting from WHAV's original 1947 transmitter site. Its audio is also carried, in part, by a number of public, educational, and government access (PEG) cable television stations.
